original_text: I will do this so that people see it happen. They will watch carefully and they will understand. They will know that the Lord's power has caused it to happen. They will know that the Holy God of Israel has created it.’ False gods have no power I will do this so that people see it happen.
korean_text: 무리가 보고 여호와의 손이 지으신 바요 이스라엘의 거룩한 이가 이것을 창조하신 바인 줄 알며 함께 헤아리며 깨달으리라

sentences.original_text: so that people see it happen
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그것이 일어나는 것을 보게 하려고

sentences.original_text: that the Lord's power has caused it to happen
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 권능이 그것을 일어나게 했다는 것을

sentences.original_text: that the Holy God of Israel has created it
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘의 거룩하신 하나님이 그것을 창조하셨다는 것을

sentences.original_text: so that people see it happen
